item.title: Can MAGA’s Spite Show Outperform Bad Bunny? (Or at Least the Puppy Bowl?)
item.description: With an anti-halftime show of its own, the MAGA-verse enters a new phase of counterprograming.

item.title: An AI Ran a Simulated Vending Machine Business. It Lied, Cheated, and Extorted Its Way to the Top
item.description: Anthropic’s newest version of Claude displayed cutthroat tactics—and also revealed some big, weird feelings.

item.title: Waymo’s Remote Helpers Are Based Overseas—And It’s Raising Big Safety Questions
item.description: The company’s acclaimed self-driving vehicles rely on agents for real-time guidance.

item.title: It Seems AI Agents Can Now Rent Human Bodies
item.description: A new startup sets up a marketplace of humans to be rented for AI agents to use.

item.title: A Retailer’s Guide to Extreme Weather
item.description: When the grid goes down, you stay up.
